SEARCH
Package src.service

Class OfficerRegistrationService

java.lang.Object
src.service.OfficerRegistrationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOfficerRegistrationService
public class OfficerRegistrationService extends Object implements IOfficerRegistrationService
Provides functionality for HDB Officers to handle registration-related tasks. This includes checking registration status, browsing available projects, and registering for one.

      public boolean registerForProject(HDBOfficer officer, Project selectedProject)
      Registers an officer to a selected project, checking for duplication with existing application or assignment.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      officer - The officer attempting to register.
      selectedProject - The project to register for.
      Returns:

    • registerForProject

      public void registerForProject(HDBOfficer officer, Scanner sc)
      Allows an officer to register interest in a project. Registration status will be marked as PENDING and saved to CSV.
      Specified by:
      registerForProject in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer attempting to register.
      sc - Scanner for input.
